verses.verse: Again <WH7725> I lifted up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> and saw, <WH7200> and behold, <WH702> four chariots <WH4818> came <WH3318> out <WH3318> from between two <WH8147> mountains; <WH2022> and the mountains <WH2022> were mountains <WH2022> of brass. <WH5178>
In the first <WH7223> chariot <WH4818> were red <WH122> horses; <WH5483> in the second <WH8145> chariot <WH4818> black <WH7838> horses; <WH5483>
in the third <WH7992> chariot <WH4818> white <WH3836> horses; <WH5483> and in the fourth <WH7243> chariot <WH4818> dappled <WH1261> horses, <WH5483> all of them powerful. <WH554>
Then I asked <WH559> the angel <WH4397> who talked <WH1696> with me, <WH113> "What are these, my lord?"

The angel <WH4397> answered <WH6030> me, <WH702> "These are the four winds <WH7307> of the sky, <WH8064> which go forth <WH3318> from standing <WH3320> before the Lord <WH113> of all the earth. <WH776>

The one with the black <WH7838> horses <WH5483> goes out <WH3318> toward the north <WH6828> country; <WH776> and the white <WH3836> went out <WH3318> after <WH310> them; <WH1261> and the dappled went forth <WH3318> toward the south <WH8486> country. <WH776>"

The strong <WH554> went out, <WH3318> and sought <WH1245> to go <WH3212> that they might walk back and forth <WH1980> through the earth: <WH776> and he said, <WH559> "Go <WH3212> around <WH1980> and through the earth! <WH776>" So they walked back and forth <WH1980> through the earth. <WH776>

Then he called <WH2199> to <WH853> me, <WH1696> and spoke to me, <WH559> saying, "Behold, <WH7200> those who go <WH3318> toward the north <WH6828> country <WH776> have quieted <WH5117> my spirit <WH7307> in the north <WH6828> country. <WH776>"
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

"Take <WH3947> of them of the captivity, <WH1473> even of Heldai, <WH2469> of Tobijah, <WH2900> and of Jedaiah; <WH3048> and come <WH935> the same day, <WH3117> and go <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of Josiah <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Zephaniah, <WH6846> where they have come <WH935> from Babylon. <WH894>

Yes, <WH3947> take silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> and make <WH6213> crowns, <WH5850> and set <WH7760> them on the head <WH7218> of Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Jehozadak, <WH3087> the high <WH1419> priest; <WH3548>

and speak <WH559> to him, <WH559> saying, <WH559> 'Thus says Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> "Behold, <WH376> the man whose name <WH8034> is the Branch: <WH6780> and he shall grow up <WH6779> out of his place; <WH1129> and he shall build the temple <WH1964> of Yahweh; <WH3068>

even he shall build <WH1129> the temple <WH1964> of Yahweh; <WH3068> and he shall bear <WH5375> the glory, <WH1935> and shall sit <WH3427> and rule <WH4910> on his throne; <WH3678> and he shall be a priest <WH3548> on his throne; <WH3678> and the counsel <WH6098> of peace <WH7965> shall be between them both. <WH8147>

The crowns <WH5850> shall be to Helem, <WH2494> and to Tobijah, <WH2900> and to Jedaiah, <WH3048> and to Hen <WH2581> the son <WH1121> of Zephaniah, <WH6846> for a memorial <WH2146> in the temple <WH1964> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

Those who are far off <WH7350> shall come <WH935> and build <WH1129> in the temple <WH1964> of Yahweh; <WH3068> and you shall know <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> has sent <WH7971> me to you. <WH8085> This will happen, if you will diligently obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>"'"
